meanings.definition: To eat or consume food in large quantities or with great enjoyment.
meanings.sent1: She was gourmandizing on the delicious buffet at the party.
meanings.sent2: He always gourmandizes on pizza night, eating slice after slice.
meanings.sent3: The cat was caught gourmandizing on the leftover turkey from Thanksgiving.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled with delight as she gourmandized on the decadent chocolate cake.
meanings.sent5: The children were gourmandizing on candy, their faces smeared with sugar.

meanings.definition: The act of indulging in excessive eating or drinking.
meanings.sent1: His gourmandizing at the all-you-can-eat buffet was legendary.
meanings.sent2: The doctor warned him about the health risks of his gourmandizing.
meanings.sent3: The gourmandizing at the office holiday party led to many full stomachs and happy faces.
meanings.sent4: Her shopping spree was a gourmandizing of designer handbags.
meanings.sent5: The gourmandizing at the chocolate festival left everyone in a sugar coma.
